Using CBDs with LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3Â¶

The LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 can be fully accessed via Python-code. Combined with the usefulness of CBDs for continuous embedded systems, it stands to reason the CBD simulator can be used to access the EV3 system. To do so, pybricks (micropython) will be used.

In order to do so, follow these installation instructions from the pybricks website. This creates a (bootable) flashed microSD card that can run Python code. Simply write your CBD models and start your simulation!

For convenience, some building blocks are prebuild in this CBD.lib.ev3 module.
